physical_form.application: Egg cartons (less common now due to environmental concerns)

physical_form.properties: Clear, strong, recyclable, gas barrier properties
Durable, flexible, recyclable, good moisture barrier

physical_form.application: Printing on egg cartons and labels
Sealing egg cartons and attaching labels

fragility.properties: Higher impact resistance than EPS, recyclable

fragility.application: Specialty egg packaging (e.g., for shipping fragile eggs)

fragility.properties: Provides cushioning and protection against vibration
fragility.application: Wrapping individual egg cartons for shipping

fragility.properties: Suspends product in the air for maximum shock protection
Reinforces corners of boxes, prevents crushing

fragility.application: Less common, but used for additional cushioning in shipping

shelf_life.properties: Moisture barrier, extends shelf life by preventing dehydration
shelf_life.application: Overwrap for egg cartons in some regions

shelf_life.properties: Controls gas composition to slow spoilage
shelf_life.application: Extending shelf life of processed egg products (e.g., liquid eggs)

shelf_life.properties: Removes ethylene gas, slowing down spoilage
shelf_life.application: Not typically used for shell eggs, but potentially for processed eggs

shelf_life.properties: Protects against UV light, which can degrade egg quality
shelf_life.application: Rare, but used in some specialized packaging

shelf_life.properties: Reduces microbial growth on the eggshell surface
shelf_life.application: Research and development stage, potential for future packaging

shelf_life.properties: Removes air to inhibit microbial growth
shelf_life.application: Primarily for processed egg products, not shell eggs

shelf_life.properties: Removes oxygen to extend shelf life
shelf_life.application: Used with modified atmosphere packaging for processed egg products
Not typical for shell eggs, may be used in specific circumstances

shelf_life.properties: Provides excellent barrier against moisture and gases
shelf_life.application: Laminates in flexible packaging for egg products

shelf_life.properties: Regulates oxygen and carbon dioxide levels
shelf_life.application: Bulk storage of eggs to extend shelf life before packaging

chemical_properties.properties: Protects against chemical migration from packaging to eggs
Prevents ink components from contaminating eggs
Prevents grease from egg yolk from seeping through the carton
Reduces oxygen levels to prevent oxidation of egg lipids
Prevents UV degradation of packaging materials
Protects against rancidity caused by oxidation
Does not alter the pH of the egg or packaging

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Inhibits bacterial growth on the carton surface
Resists bacterial adhesion, can be sanitized
Prevents mold growth, reduces bacterial contamination
Provides a barrier against external contaminants
Can withstand high temperatures for sterilization
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Packaging for processed egg products in aseptic conditions

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Indicates if the package has been opened
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Egg cartons and processed egg containers

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Inhibits fungal growth on the carton
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Rare, potential use in high-humidity environments

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Added to plastics to prevent microbial growth
Designed to withstand rigorous cleaning processes
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Packaging equipment for egg processing plants

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Maintains temperature, protects against temperature fluctuations
Changes color to indicate if the eggs have been exposed to unsafe temperatures
Absorbs or releases heat to maintain a constant temperature
Reflects radiant heat to keep eggs cool
Maintains bond strength at different temperatures
Designed to maintain a specific temperature range
Insulates entire pallet loads of eggs
Withstands freezing temperatures without cracking or degrading
Can be heated in ovens or microwaves
High insulation value, reduces temperature fluctuations

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Indicates if the package has been opened or tampered with
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Egg cartons and processed egg containers
Packaging for egg-based products that may contain allergens or additives

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Provides structural integrity to prevent damage during transport
Prevents leakage of liquid egg products
Prevents escape of gases from modified atmosphere packaging
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Processed egg products with extended shelf life

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Prevents degradation of egg contents due to UV exposure
Protects against impact damage during shipping
Clearly indicates handling instructions and potential hazards

visibility_and_display.properties: Allows consumers to see the eggs inside
Vibrant colors and clear graphics for branding
Enhances the visual appeal of the packaging
Showcase the eggs while protecting them
Adds a tactile element and enhances visual appeal
Provides additional information about the eggs
Adds a premium and eye-catching effect
Provides product information without obscuring the eggs
Engages consumers with augmented reality or other interactive features

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Holds specific amounts of liquid egg products
Dispenses liquid egg products in precise amounts

quantity_and_dosage.application: Military rations or emergency food supplies

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Allows for measuring specific volumes of egg whites or yolks
Reusable containers for transporting large quantities of eggs
Tailored to specific egg sizes or quantities

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Indicates if the package has been opened
Secures the carton and deters theft
Tracks the location of the eggs

value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Prevents theft by making it difficult to identify the product

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Triggers an alarm if the eggs are taken without authorization
Prevents unauthorized access to pallet loads of eggs
